$schema.description: Optional JSON schema reference to aid editors.

style.description: Defines the style of the application.

css.description: Path to the Tailwind CSS file.

oneOf.description: Filesystem path for the alias. Import prefix is derived from aliasPrefixes.

filesystem.description: Filesystem path where CLI should write files.

import.description: Custom import alias to use in generated files.

aliases.description: Defines alias mappings for project directories.

^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$.description: Prefix string used for the alias when aliases.* is provided as a simple string.

aliasPrefixes.description: Defines prefix mappings corresponding to the aliases.

barrel.description: Relative path to the barrel file that CLI should maintain.

strategy.description: Emission strategy for exports. Currently only 'named' is supported.

exports.description: Configure export barrels the CLI should synchronise.

packageName.description: Optional npm workspace or package name.

root.description: Path from repository root to this workspace.

packageName.description: Optional npm workspace or package name for the linked workspace.

root.description: Path from repository root to the linked workspace.

config.description: Relative path from the current workspace to the linked workspace's config file.

linkedWorkspaces.description: Workspaces that should receive shared files and dependency updates.

workspace.description: Metadata describing this workspace for monorepo-aware behaviour.
